The '''Dustless Bewildering Cover''' technique utilises [[water]]<ref name="d4"/> vapour to bend the light around the user essentially making them invisible.

This technique allows the user to completely erase their presence, causing them to have neither a physical form nor detectable chakra while the technique is active. As such, they cannot be detected through [[Sensing Technique|traditional means]] such as chakra detection or through heightened senses. 

== Trivia ==
* Mū's mastery of this technique helped earn him the moniker {{translation|"Non-Person"|無人|Mujin|viz=Null Man}}.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 525, page 1</ref>
* The latter half of the jutsu's name plays on {{translation|''meisai''|迷彩}}, meaning "camouflage".
